name: Barber
ability: If you died today or tonight, the Demon may choose 2 players (not another Demon) to swap characters.

legacy.otherNightReminder: If the Barber died today: Wake the Demon. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then the Barber token. The Demon either shows a 'no' head shake or points to 2 other players. If they chose players: swap the character tokens. Wake each swapped player. Show 'You are' then their new character token.

otherNights.description: If you died today or tonight, the Demon may choose 2 players to swap characters.

information.customMessage: If the Barber died, the Demon chooses 2 players to swap characters.
